name: arcturus
description: Manages state in worker threads through simple actions, reducers and selectors

scripts.build:umd: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=development rollup -c -i src/index.js -o dist/arcturus.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=production rollup -c -i src/index.js -o dist/arcturus.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:es && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min
